resources.string: Error, Please enter a valid weight
Error, please enter a valid value
The Arithmetic mean is used to find the average value of a list. Just add the values and divide by the number of them.
The Weighted average adds weights to values, making them have a bigger impact on the final average. It is used to calculate scores with different weights.
The Harmonic mean, divide the number of elements by the sum of the inverses of each value.
